Hello blank fragment Pasta 
Cream Cheese 
Parmesan Cheese 
Olive Oil 
Garlic 
Salt Pepper Cook your pasta until al dente 
Saute’ garlic in olive oil until fragrant 
Add cream cheese, pasta cooking water, parmesan, and stir well 
Drain and add pasta to the skillet 
Toss until well combined, adding some pasta water if needed //maggi Shameik Moore, Hailee Steinfeld, Jake Johnson, Oscar Isaac, Issa Rae, Brian Tyree Henry, Luna Lauren Vélez, Daniel Kaluuya, Jason Schwartzman "Spider-Man: Across the Spider-Verse" follows Miles Morales as he embarks on an epic journey across the multiverse. Teaming up with Gwen Stacy and other Spider-People, they must confront a new villain that threatens the existence of all dimensions. This animated film blends stunning visuals with a compelling story about heroism and the power of teamwork. //cake Maggi Noodles 
Water 
Maggi Masala Add one and half cup of water Add maggi noodles and boil it Add the maggi masala on to it 
Wait for 2 mins
